front.title: Real-Time Transport Protocol (RTP) Payload Format and Adaptive Multi-Rate Wideband plus (AMR-WB+) Audio Codec

abstract.t: This document specifies a real-time transport protocol (RTP) payloadformat to be used for Adaptive Multi-Rate Wideband plus (AMR-WB+)encoded audio signals. The AMR-WB+ codec is an audio extension of theAMR-WB codec providing additional modes designed to give higherquality of music and speech than the original modes. The payloadformat is designed according to the principles outlined in theexisting payload formats for AMR and AMR-WB, RFC3267 [9]. A MIMEtype registration is included for AMR-WB+.
